name: Invader Shooter: Fighting Squa
description:
Invader Shooter: Fighting Squad is a classic space shooting game with a whole new look! Come and play it to help you remember your own intense childhood.Ride on peregrine falcon and be a protector of the earth and your goal is alien extermination.you could have played many space war games but this killing alien falcon game is next level. Fight Spatial wars and attack on the godinez to survive.
FEATURES:
Beautiful levels with immersive missions to complete.
Multiple extreme boss battles.
Upgrade your shields, guns, missiles, lasers, mega-bombs and magnets.
Risk everything to rescue civilians.
